means: 点燃街灯的灯夫，<美>（点灯用的）纸捻（或小木板）

sentence.Network_cn: 这时候点街灯的灯夫出现了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 我们的“点灯人”（lamplighter）拆下扫帚柄充当点灯杆。教室里的空水桶则是她的大灯座。
lamplight 灯火lamplighter 点灯用具lamplit 灯光照明的
7、点路灯的（Lamplighters）：负责监听、递送情报的小组。8、妈妈（Mothers):“圆场”高级人员的秘书和打字员，通常是服务多年忠 …
这张让我想起勒卡雷爷爷的锅匠系列中，六处的内勤部门被昵称为点路灯组（lamplighters）。漂亮小孩领军的Q支部，是整个庞德系 …

list.abs: lamplight mirrors she is wearing white bottom blue print the balanced figure of unlined upper garment , mirror her nice face .灯光映出她穿着白底蓝花布便衫的匀称的身段，映出她好看的脸。
Why can not you sit below lamplight and see more clearly ?, 你为什么不坐在灯光下面而可以看得更清楚些?
studio Include audio equipment , maintenance , wiring , debugging , camera , lamplight design studio stage sets , audio equipment control etc .包括视音频设备的接线，启动，维护，摄像机的调试，演播室舞台布景、灯光设计，音频设备的控制等。
Same argument , if indoor lamplight is aspersed equably to everywhere , criterion the result is obvious ;, 一样的道理 , 假如室内灯光均匀地洒向各处 , 则效果平淡无奇;

means.word_mean: 1. (when gas was used for streetlights) a person who lights and extinguishes streetlights

auth_sentence.content: The Republicans need a lamplighter out front every day a smart, articulate, credible and TV-savvy party spokesman.
